#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string seq;
		cin>>seq;
		
		int ans=0;
		char one_hole[]={'A','D','O','P','Q','R'};
		char two_hole='B';
		
		for(int i=0;i<seq.size();i++)
		{
			if(seq[i]=='A' || seq[i]=='D' || seq[i]=='O' || seq[i]=='P' || seq[i]=='Q' || seq[i]=='R')
			ans+=1;
			else if(seq[i]=='B')
			ans+=2;
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
}
